game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the dark cave
game.description: Your quest is to venture into the dangerous dark cave and recover the lost artifact that is said to possess incredible power.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a magical amulet

task.objective: Reach the entrance of the dark cave
task.description: You need to journey through the enchanted forest to reach the entrance of the dark cave.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the cave
task.description: A fierce beast guards the entrance. Defeat it to proceed forward.
The artifact is kept at the deepest level of the cave. Retrieve it and return back to the wizard.
task.location: Deepest level of the Dark Cave
